mapper.select: SELECT mm.custNo, mm.gymNo, mm.machineNo, gm.machineName, gm.machineImgname, gm.holdingQuantity, gm.usingQuantity FROM mymachine mm JOIN GYMMACHINE gm ON mm.machineNo = gm.machineNo WHERE mm.custNo = #{custNo} AND mm.myMachineStatus = '1'
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO mymachine USING dual ON (custNo = #{custNo} AND machineNo = #{machineNo}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (custNo, machineNo, gymNo, myMachineStatus) VALUES (#{custNo}, #{machineNo}, #{gymNo}, '1') WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET myMachineStatus = '0'
